name: IRBM Science Park
goal:
IRBM is committed to accelerating discovery and preclinical
development of disease modifying small molecule and peptidic drug candidates. Therapeutic areas of expertise include neurodegeneration, oncology, viral and parasitic diseases.
interests: Consumers, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: we are committed to spread scientific knowledge within the European countries in order to collaborate with them sharing scientific discoveries supporting each other. As a matter of fact we sensitize all the MEPs who deals about research, health and industry issues
